title: A Commodities Perfect Storm. Bed Bath & Beyond Goes Meme Stock.
description:
Nickel, wheat, and oil are spiking--but dividend stocks might be better for fighting inflation. Also, a retailer's shares go vertical, as a listener looks for baby stocks.
